arts.ttl: Stuttgart end losing streak to reach Pokal semis
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart book a DFB-Pokal semi-final place following another Deniz Undav winning goal against Augsburg.

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: VfB Stuttgart vs. FC Augsburg
arts.sum: Here are the lineups for this season’s first DFB-Pokal quarter-finals.

arts.ttl: DFB Pokal | Predicted Stuttgart v Augsburg XIs
arts.sum: Stuttgart will have to do without Anthony Rouault for their DFB Pokal quarter-final against Augsburg on Tuesday night after securing a deadline day move to Rennes. But VfB were busy…

arts.ttl: Official | Augsburg loan Patric Pfeiffer and Tim Breithaupt out to Magdeburg and Kaiserslautern
arts.sum: FC Augsburg confirmed two transactions on transfer deadline day.

arts.ttl: Augsburg send midfielder out on loan
arts.sum: Augsburg midfielder Tim Breithaupt will spend the rest of the season on loan at Kaiserslautern.

arts.ttl: VfB Stuttgart vs. Augsburg: DFB Cup quarter-final probable teams, match stats & LIVE blog!
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart host Bundesliga rivals Augsburg in the DFB Cup quarter-finals on Tuesday (kick-off: 8.45pm CET). Augsburg's Samuel Essende is one of seven players on a competition-leading three goals in this season's DFB Cup, including Stuttgart counterpart Woltemade.

arts.ttl: VfB Stuttgart vs. Augsburg, DFB-Pokal quarter-final preview: Season definer for Stuttgart
arts.sum: Whilst Stuttgart have faltered across recent fixtures, Augsburg have picked up some serious domestic form. The two sides go head to head at MHPArena on Thursday evening, with a place in the DFB-Pokal semi-finals on the line.

arts.ttl: Official | Stuttgart confirm €15m sale of Anthony Rouault and purchases of Finn Jeltsch and Luca Jaquez
arts.sum: Three transactions involving defenders departing and arriving at VfB Stuttgart are now official.

arts.ttl: Confirmed: Stuttgart land German youth international
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart have confirmed the signing of Finn Jeltsch from FC Nürnberg.
VfB Stuttgart have confirmed the departure of Anthony Rouault, who leaves the club for French side Stade Rennais.
